title: H1B Eligibility Analysis Results
description: Complete H1B visa eligibility analysis output including scores, recommendations, and timelines

applicantName.title: Applicant Name
applicantName.description: Name of the H1B visa applicant

jobTitle.title: Job Title
jobTitle.description: Position title for the H1B application

yearsOfExperience.title: Years of Experience
yearsOfExperience.description: Total years of relevant work experience

lotteryTimeline.title: Lottery Timeline
lotteryTimeline.description: Expected H1B lottery registration and selection timeline

missingDocuments.title: Missing Documents
missingDocuments.description: List of required documents that are missing

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.description: Action items and recommendations to improve eligibility

eligibilityBreakdown.title: Eligibility Breakdown
eligibilityBreakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of eligibility criteria scores

specialtyOccupation.title: Specialty Occupation Status
specialtyOccupation.description: Assessment of whether the position qualifies as a specialty occupation

employerEligibility.title: Employer Eligibility
employerEligibility.description: Assessment of employer's ability to sponsor H1B

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.description: Prioritized action items for the applicant

estimatedCosts.title: Estimated Costs
estimatedCosts.description: Breakdown of expected H1B application costs

capExemptEligible.title: Cap-Exempt Eligible
capExemptEligible.description: Whether the position may qualify for cap-exempt H1B

timestamp.title: Analysis Timestamp
timestamp.description: Date and time when the analysis was performed

analysisVersion.title: Analysis Version
analysisVersion.description: Version of the eligibility checker used

userType.title: User Type
userType.description: Type of user running the analysis
